net.sf.jasperreports.engine.export

Class GenericElementReportTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jasperreports.engine.export.GenericElementReportTransformer

  • public final class GenericElementReportTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that applies GenericElementTransformers to a filled report.

      • transformGenericElements

        public static void transformGenericElements(JasperReportsContext jasperReportsContext,
                            JasperPrint report,
                            java.lang.String transformerExportKey)
        Applies generic element transformers of a specific key to a filled report by replacing generic elements with the transformed elements.
        Parameters:
        report - the report
        transformerExportKey - the key used to resolve element transformers
        See Also:
        GenericElementTransformer, GenericElementHandlerBundle.getHandler(String, String)
